mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT FROM USER_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
